displayBio.en: Liang Yuanwei (born 1977, Xi’an) graduated from the Central Academy of Fine Arts, Beijing, with a Bachelor of Arts in 1999 and a Master of Arts in 2004. Often working with painting and installation, she is known for her meticulous, time-consuming, and repetitive processes. Liang lives and works in Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 梁遠葦 (1977年生於西安，現工作及生活於北京)，1999 年畢業於北京中央美術學院，獲文學學士學位，並於2004年獲該學院頒發文學碩士學位。梁遠葦較常創作繪畫及裝置作品，作品以精細、費時及重複的製作工序見稱。
